biotools.summary: Offers a unique and flexible interface for the comprehensive visualization, exploration and analysis of 2D gel data. It provides powerful and innovative solutions to shorten the path from data acquisition to protein information, both for conventional 2-DE and DIGE (Fluorescence Difference Gel Electrophoresis) gels.

bioschemas.name: Melanie
